dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Gabriel, the Macewielding Angel. What business do you have meddling in the affairs of the Guardians of the Light?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Morvath, the Dark Sorcerer. I seek the power of the Heart of Light to bring darkness upon this world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A Dark Sorcerer seeking the power of light? Your presence reeks of malevolence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness will consume all in time. I offer you power beyond your wildest dreams if you join me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power from darkness? My allegiance lies with the light, I shall not succumb to your temptations.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loyalty to the light blinds you. Prepare to face the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I will not falter in my duty. Light shall prevail over darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your conviction. Farewell, Gabriel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the light guide your path, Morvath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are unwavering in your dedication. Perhaps we could settle this without bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There can be no alliance between light and darkness. Our paths diverge here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. Farewell, Gabriel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the light shield you from the shadows, Morvath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. Let our blades decide the victor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Prepare for the light's judgment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your resolve is admirable. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the light continue to illuminate your path, Morvath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a traveler passing through. I mean no harm to the Guardians of the Light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Traveler or not, your presence brings a shadow over these lands. Be gone, dark one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall heed your warning and depart. Farewell, Gabriel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the light vanquish the darkness that follows you, traveler.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a tension in these lands. Is there a way to bring peace?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is found in the light, not in the shadows you seek. Leave this place.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall respect your wishes and leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May your path be free of darkness, traveler.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If peace cannot be achieved, then darkness will reign.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Let the light guide those who resist the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take my leave. May the light watch over these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The light will forever guard against the encroaching darkness. Be on your way, traveler.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Morvath, the Eclipse Seeker. I come in search of knowledge and power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and power that threatens the balance of this realm. Your presence is unwelcome.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The balance is an illusion. Embrace the shadows, Gabriel, and discover true power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The shadows you wield are not of the light. I shall not be swayed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you refuse the shadows, then prepare to face them in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I stand ready to face your darkness with the light's radiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: May your path be forever bathed in light, Gabriel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: And may the shadows never cloud your judgment, Morvath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand, not to harm. Can we not find common ground?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground between light and darkness is but a fleeting dream. Our paths diverge here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I shall respect your boundaries. Farewell, Gabriel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the light always guide your way, Morvath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If understanding cannot be reached, then let fate decide our course.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Let the light reveal the truth of our encounter.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see there is no room for negotiation. Farewell, Gabriel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the light continue to push back the shadows, Eclipse Seeker.
